mapper.select: SELECT station_name AS sido, station_code as code, DATE(measurement_date_time) AS date, pm10 AS pm10_value FROM air_pollution_stats WHERE DATE(measurement_date_time) = '2025-08-01'

SELECT station_name AS sido, measurement_date_time AS date, data_type AS dataType, so2 AS so2_value, co AS co_value, o3 AS o3_value, no2 AS no2_value, pm10 AS pm10_value, pm25 AS pm25_value, khai AS khai_value FROM air_pollution_stats WHERE station_code=#{districtCode} ORDER BY measurement_date_time DESC LIMIT 1
